name: adrenoceptor alpha 2B

reactome.name: Adrenaline signalling through Alpha-2 adrenergic receptor

summary: This intronless gene encodes a seven-pass transmembrane protein. This protein is a member of a subfamily of G protein-coupled receptors that regulate neurotransmitter release from sympathetic nerves and from adrenergic neurons in the central nervous system. [provided by RefSeq, Apr 2014].
